leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研知识图谱-实体规范化与证据链生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 抽取→对齐→融合→推理→版本→评测

tools.name: DS-JedAI
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Spatial JedAI for holistic geospatial interlinking on Spark
tools.detailed_description: A distributed system for Holistic Geospatial Interlinking that discovers topological relations between geospatial datasets using Apache Spark.

tools.name: JedAI-spatial
tools.one_line_profile: Three-dimensional geospatial interlinking tool
tools.detailed_description: A module of the JedAI toolkit focused on performing geospatial interlinking and entity resolution for three-dimensional spatial data.

tools.name: pyJedAI
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for end-to-end Entity Resolution workflows
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library leveraging the Python data science ecosystem to build and execute powerful end-to-end Entity Resolution workflows.

tools.name: QuitStore
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed version control system for RDF knowledge bases
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables distributed version control for RDF Knowledge Bases by managing Quads in Git, facilitating provenance and collaboration.

tools.name: Spline
tools.one_line_profile: Data lineage tracking and visualization solution for Spark
tools.detailed_description: A data lineage tracking and visualization tool that captures and visualizes data processing workflows, essential for data provenance in scientific pipelines.

tools.name: AgreementMakerLight
tools.one_line_profile: Automated ontology matching system
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and automated ontology matching system designed to handle large ontologies, widely used in OAEI competitions for alignment tasks.

tools.name: Kelpie
tools.one_line_profile: XAI framework for interpreting Link Predictions on Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: An explainable AI framework designed to interpret and explain link predictions within knowledge graphs, aiding in model transparency and analysis.

tools.name: OntoMerger
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology alignment library for deduplicating knowledge graph nodes
tools.detailed_description: A library developed by AstraZeneca for ontology alignment and node deduplication, facilitating the merging of overlapping concepts in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: Blue Brain Nexus
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph and data management platform for data-driven science
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive knowledge graph and data management platform designed to support data-driven science by enabling data integration, provenance tracking, and search.

tools.name: GraphRAG Workbench
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 3D visualization tool for Microsoft GraphRAG knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A visual analytics tool for exploring entities, relationships, and communities in knowledge graphs generated by GraphRAG, supporting scientific data interpretation.

tools.name: DagsHub Client
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for DagsHub data collaboration and versioning
tools.detailed_description: Client library for DagsHub, enabling data scientists to version control data and models, supporting reproducibility and provenance in scientific workflows.

tools.name: Fast Data Science (fds)
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for data and code version control
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface that wraps Git and DVC to streamline version control for data and code, facilitating scientific data management and reproducibility.

tools.name: matlab-dataone
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab Toolbox for DataONE repository interaction and provenance management
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab Toolbox that provides functions to interact with data repositories that implement the DataONE service API. It includes client-side functions for managing provenance (the history) of derived data products, facilitating scientific data reproducibility.

tools.name: Strwythura
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph construction and entity resolution pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A tool to construct knowledge graphs from unstructured data sources, organized by results from entity resolution. It implements an enhanced GraphRAG approach and an ontology pipeline for optimizing AI application outcomes within specific domains.

tools.name: CEA
tools.one_line_profile: Collective Entity Alignment via Adaptive Features
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Collective Entity Alignment via Adaptive Features (CEA) algorithm. It serves as a solver for aligning entities across different knowledge graphs, a key task in knowledge fusion.

tools.name: pile_dedupe
tools.one_line_profile: Deduplication tool for large-scale language model datasets
tools.detailed_description: Code used for deduplicating The Pile, a massive dataset for training large language models. It handles near-deduplication to improve data quality for scientific modeling in NLP.

tools.name: SparkER
tools.one_line_profile: Entity Resolution framework for Apache Spark
tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing Entity Resolution on large datasets using Apache Spark. It enables scalable record linkage and deduplication for scientific data processing.

tools.name: CG-MuAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Collective Multi-type Entity Alignment solver
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Collective Multi-type Entity Alignment Between Knowledge Graphs'. It provides a method for aligning entities of multiple types across knowledge graphs.

tools.name: GraphFusion-NMN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Memory Networks combined with Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform that combines Neural Memory Networks with knowledge graphs for real-time, adaptive, and intelligent systems, useful for scientific reasoning and QA.

tools.name: LMP-EA
tools.one_line_profile: Entity Alignment with Matchable Prior Learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Learning Matchable Prior For Entity Alignment with Unlabeled Dangling Cases' (NeurIPS 2024). A solver for aligning entities in knowledge graphs, handling dangling cases.

tools.name: CMF
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata and lineage tracking for ML pipelines
tools.detailed_description: CMF (Common Metadata Framework) library helps to collect and store information associated with ML pipelines. It tracks the lineages for artifacts and executions of distributed AI pipelines, ensuring reproducibility and provenance.

tools.name: GWL
tools.one_line_profile: Gromov-Wasserstein Learning for Graph Matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Gromov-Wasserstein Learning for Graph Matching and Node Embedding. Useful for aligning structures in scientific graphs.

tools.name: s-gwl
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Gromov-Wasserstein Learning
tools.detailed_description: Scalable Gromov-Wasserstein Learning for Graph Partitioning and Matching. An extension of GWL for larger graphs.

tools.name: multi-data-lineage-capture-py
tools.one_line_profile: IBM Multi-Lineage Data System capture library
tools.detailed_description: Python client library for the IBM Multi-Lineage Data System, facilitating the capture of data lineage information for governance and provenance.

tools.name: AKE
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial Knowledge Embedding for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Guiding Entity Alignment via Adversarial Knowledge Embedding'. A solver for aligning entities across knowledge graphs using adversarial learning.

tools.name: pycellin
tools.one_line_profile: Cell lineage analysis framework
tools.detailed_description: Graph-based framework to manipulate and analyze cell lineages from cell tracking data. It allows for the reconstruction and analysis of biological developmental paths.

tools.name: CGPrompt
tools.one_line_profile: Concept Graph Recovery using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: Leveraging Large Language Models for Concept Graph Recovery and Question Answering. Useful for constructing and aligning educational knowledge graphs.

tools.name: FEBRL-fork
tools.one_line_profile: Freely Extensible Biomedical Record Linkage
tools.detailed_description: Fork of the Freely Extensible Biomedical Record Linkage (FEBRL) program. A tool specifically designed for data cleaning, standardization, and record linkage in biomedical datasets.

tools.name: recordlinkage
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for record linkage and deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and modular toolkit for record linkage and duplicate detection in Python. It provides tools for indexing, comparing, and classifying record pairs.

tools.name: recordlinkage-review
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for record linkage validation
tools.detailed_description: A tool to make golden data or validate record linkage results. It provides a user interface for manual review of potential matches.

tools.name: SMAT
tools.one_line_profile: Schema Matching Model
tools.detailed_description: Model and datasets for schema matching, a critical step in data integration and alignment.

tools.name: niprov
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance for neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: A library for tracking provenance in neuroimaging data processing pipelines. It helps manage the history of files and transformations in neuroscience research.

tools.name: GEN
tools.one_line_profile: Transductive Few-shot Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Official Code Repository for 'Learning to Extrapolate Knowledge: Transductive Few-shot Out-of-Graph Link Prediction'. A solver for predicting links in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: RGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Graph Convolutional Network for Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Pytorch implementation of a Relational Graph Convolutional Network (RGCN) Link Prediction Model. Used for modeling relational data and predicting missing links in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: SpineBasedRecordLinkage.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Record linkage library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing record linkage in the Julia programming language, suitable for scientific data integration tasks.

tools.name: BERTMap
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-Based Ontology Alignment System
tools.detailed_description: A system for ontology alignment that utilizes BERT embeddings to find correspondences between concepts in different ontologies.

tools.name: OntoAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology Alignment Utilities
tools.detailed_description: A collection of codes and utilities relevant to ontology alignment tasks, supporting research in semantic interoperability.

tools.name: OpenTLP
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework and implementations for temporal link prediction methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library and benchmark for temporal link prediction in dynamic graphs, providing implementations of various methods and a taxonomy for the field.

tools.name: Gremlinator
tools.one_line_profile: Translator for converting SPARQL queries to Gremlin traversals
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to bridge the gap between RDF/SPARQL and Property Graph/Gremlin ecosystems by automatically converting SPARQL queries into Gremlin graph pattern matching traversals.

tools.name: Kosh
tools.one_line_profile: Data store and query API for scientific codes
tools.detailed_description: A Python API developed by LLNL that sits on top of Sina, allowing scientific codes to store, query, and share data efficiently, facilitating data provenance and access.

tools.name: PIRL
tools.one_line_profile: Point-of-contact Interactive Record Linkage software
tools.detailed_description: Software developed by LSHTM for interactive record linkage, designed to resolve entities and link records in demographic and health surveillance data.

tools.name: GMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Matching Network for semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Graph Matching Network (GMNet) that leverages graph matching techniques for large-scale part semantic segmentation, applicable in computer vision and image analysis.

tools.name: horizon
tools.one_line_profile: Map matching and routing library
tools.detailed_description: A Go library for map matching (snapping GPS points to a road graph) and routing, serving as an entity resolution tool for geospatial trajectory data.

tools.name: Graph-Matching-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Implementations of Graph Matching Networks for graph similarity
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementations of deep graph matching methods (GMN, COMMON) for learning similarity and alignment between graph-structured objects.

tools.name: pandas-dedupe
tools.one_line_profile: Pandas integration for the Dedupe library
tools.detailed_description: A utility that simplifies the use of the Dedupe library for entity resolution and deduplication directly within Pandas DataFrames, facilitating data cleaning workflows.

tools.name: KG-TACT
tools.one_line_profile: Topology-Aware Correlations for Inductive Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the TACT model for inductive link prediction in knowledge graphs, focusing on topology-aware correlations between relations.

tools.name: KGE-HAKE
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchy-Aware Knowledge Graph Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the HAKE model for learning hierarchy-aware knowledge graph embeddings, useful for link prediction and modeling semantic hierarchies.

tools.name: RREA
tools.one_line_profile: Relational Reflection Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the RREA method for entity alignment in cross-lingual knowledge graphs, leveraging relational reflection.

tools.name: SimplE
tools.one_line_profile: SimplE Embedding for Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SimplE model for knowledge graph embedding and link prediction, providing a simple yet effective baseline for KG completion.

tools.name: RelationPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: R-GCNs for Relational Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Relational Graph Convolutional Networks (R-GCNs) specifically for the task of relational link prediction in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: semhash
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Semantic Text Deduplication & Filtering
tools.detailed_description: A library for fast semantic text deduplication and filtering, useful for curating large-scale text datasets for scientific NLP or knowledge extraction.

tools.name: recordr
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance tracking for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed by NCEAS for tracking data provenance, allowing researchers to record and query the history of data processing steps.

tools.name: NeMo Curator
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable data preprocessing and curation toolkit for LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A scalable toolkit for curating large-scale datasets for Large Language Models, including modules for deduplication, filtering, and data quality control.

tools.name: mismo
tools.one_line_profile: SQL/Ibis powered record linkage library
tools.detailed_description: A record linkage library that leverages SQL and Ibis for scalable entity resolution, aiming to provide an sklearn-like interface for linking tasks.

tools.name: flowcept
tools.one_line_profile: Runtime provenance for AI and scientific workflows
tools.detailed_description: A tool from ORNL for capturing, enriching, and querying runtime provenance data in AI and scientific workflows across edge, cloud, and HPC environments.

tools.name: er-evaluation
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Evaluation Framework for Entity Resolution
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to evaluate entity resolution systems end-to-end, providing metrics and tools for assessing performance.

tools.name: OpenBioLink
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for biomedical link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A resource and evaluation framework specifically for link prediction models on heterogeneous biomedical graph data, including benchmarks and datasets.

tools.name: SAFRAN
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable rule application for link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A scalable and fast engine for applying non-redundant rules for link prediction in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: online_place_recognition
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based visual place recognition
tools.detailed_description: A graph-based image sequence matching tool for visual place recognition in changing environments, used in robotics and SLAM.

tools.name: prov-cpl
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for collecting and manipulating data provenance (W3C PROV)
tools.detailed_description: A Core Provenance Library (CPL) that provides a C++ implementation for collecting, storing, and querying data provenance, supporting the W3C PROV standard for scientific reproducibility.

tools.name: rapidfuzz-duckdb
tools.one_line_profile: DuckDB extension for fuzzy string matching and deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A DuckDB community extension that integrates RapidFuzz algorithms, enabling efficient fuzzy search, deduplication, and record linkage directly within database queries for data cleaning workflows.

tools.name: ContinuousSubgraphMatching
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance continuous subgraph matching solver
tools.detailed_description: An in-depth implementation of continuous subgraph matching algorithms (CSM), providing a solver for detecting complex patterns in evolving graph data, relevant for network analysis.

tools.name: OpenEars
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time audio classification sensor for bioacoustics
tools.detailed_description: A software sensor designed to classify sounds in real-time, used in ecological monitoring and bioacoustics to detect and identify species or events from audio streams.

tools.name: EAkit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for Entity Alignment in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and extensible PyTorch-based toolkit that implements multiple entity alignment algorithms, facilitating the comparison and application of EA methods in knowledge graph research.

tools.name: TeleMem
tools.one_line_profile: Memory system for AI agents with semantic deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance memory system for AI agents featuring semantic deduplication and long-term dialogue memory, supporting complex reasoning tasks in AI-driven scientific workflows.

tools.name: ThinkMatch
tools.one_line_profile: Research protocol and benchmark for deep graph matching
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive research protocol and benchmarking framework for deep graph matching, providing standardized evaluation and implementation of various graph matching algorithms.

tools.name: pygmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for graph matching algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit dedicated to graph matching, offering efficient implementations of standard and deep learning-based graph matching algorithms for structure analysis.

tools.name: trrackjs
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance tracking library for web-based visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to track interaction history and data provenance in web-based scientific visualizations, enabling reproducibility and undo/redo capabilities in analysis tools.

tools.name: Magneto-Matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Schema matching tool combining small and large language models
tools.detailed_description: Magneto is a schema matching system that leverages both small and large language models to perform cost-effective and accurate schema alignment, developed by the VIDA lab at NYU.

tools.name: VisTrails
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific workflow and provenance management system
tools.detailed_description: VisTrails is an open-source scientific workflow management system that provides comprehensive provenance infrastructure to maintain detailed history of steps and data derived during exploratory tasks.

tools.name: SoptSC
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq data analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: SoptSC is a MATLAB tool for single cell data analysis, enabling unsupervised inference of clustering, cell lineage, pseudotime, and cell-cell communication networks from scRNA-seq data.

tools.name: YADL
tools.one_line_profile: Yet Another Dedupe Library for data deduplication
tools.detailed_description: YADL is a C library designed for efficient data deduplication tasks, providing core functionality for identifying and removing duplicate records.

tools.name: elasticsearch-entity-resolution
tools.one_line_profile: Elasticsearch plugin for entity resolution
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Elasticsearch that implements entity resolution capabilities based on the Duke engine, allowing for deduplication and record linkage directly within the search engine.

tools.name: LineagePulse
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis for single-cell RNA-seq
tools.detailed_description: LineagePulse is an R package for performing differential expression analysis on single-cell RNA-seq data, accounting for dropout and other technical noise.

tools.name: map-matching-2
tools.one_line_profile: High performance map matching with MDPs and HMMs
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for high-performance map matching of GPS trajectories to road networks using Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) and Hidden Markov Models (HMMs), useful for geospatial data analysis.

tools.name: AgreementMaker
tools.one_line_profile: Automated ontology matching system
tools.detailed_description: AgreementMaker is a comprehensive system for automated ontology matching, capable of aligning complex ontologies to facilitate semantic interoperability and data integration.

tools.name: AiiDA WorkGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management extension for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA WorkGraph allows for efficient design and management of flexible scientific workflows within the AiiDA ecosystem, featuring GUI support, checkpointing, and provenance tracking.

tools.name: CoReNer
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task model for NER, relation extraction, and coreference
tools.detailed_description: CoReNer is a multi-task learning model designed for named-entity recognition, relation extraction, entity mention detection, and coreference resolution, facilitating knowledge extraction and entity normalization.

tools.name: graphical-record-linkage
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical record linkage system encapsulation
tools.detailed_description: A Python encapsulation of the graphical record linkage system proposed by Steorts et al., providing tools for probabilistic entity resolution and deduplication.

tools.name: multilink
tools.one_line_profile: R package for multifile record linkage
tools.detailed_description: multilink is an R package implementing multifile partitioning methodology for record linkage and duplicate detection, enabling linkage across multiple datasets.

tools.name: DeepMatcher
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based entity and text matching package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing entity and text matching using deep learning, developed to handle fuzzy matching and record linkage tasks in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: py_labeler
tools.one_line_profile: Labeling tool for the Magellan entity matching system
tools.detailed_description: A labeling tool designed for the Magellan entity matching ecosystem, facilitating the creation of labeled datasets for training entity resolution models.

tools.name: Hamilton
tools.one_line_profile: Dataflow definition framework with built-in lineage and metadata tracking
tools.detailed_description: A framework for defining testable, modular, and self-documenting dataflows that automatically encodes lineage, tracing, and metadata, suitable for scientific data pipelines.

tools.name: FutureOfAIviaAI
tools.one_line_profile: Link prediction implementation for growing knowledge networks
tools.detailed_description: Implements high-quality link prediction methods for exponentially growing knowledge networks, specifically applied to predicting trends in AI research.

tools.name: museum_provenance
tools.one_line_profile: Library for extracting structured data from museum provenance records
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby library designed to parse and extract structured data from unstructured museum provenance records, supporting digital humanities and art history research.

tools.name: dbt-colibri
tools.one_line_profile: Column lineage extraction tool for dbt projects
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool for extracting and analyzing column-level lineage within dbt projects, aiding in data provenance and impact analysis.

tools.name: SimplE
tools.one_line_profile: SimplE embedding implementation for knowledge graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the SimplE embedding model for performing link prediction tasks in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: dedupe (bakdata)
tools.one_line_profile: Java DSL for online data deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A Java Domain Specific Language (DSL) for performing online deduplication of data streams or datasets.

tools.name: rensa
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance MinHash implementation for deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based, high-performance implementation of MinHash with Python bindings, designed for efficient similarity estimation and deduplication of large datasets.

tools.name: Bigraph
tools.one_line_profile: Bipartite-network link prediction library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing link prediction specifically in bipartite networks.

tools.name: FlexMatcher
tools.one_line_profile: Schema matching package for mediated schemas
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for schema matching that handles the problem of matching multiple source schemas to a single mediated schema.

tools.name: a-la-mode
tools.one_line_profile: Data pipeline tool with incrementality and provenance
tools.detailed_description: A tool for describing pure data pipelines that enables incrementality (avoiding repeated work) and maintains data provenance.

tools.name: wit
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms for schema matching
tools.detailed_description: A collection of algorithms and tools for performing schema matching tasks.

tools.name: coref-ee
tools.one_line_profile: Coreference resolution with entity equalization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for coreference resolution that implements an entity equalization approach to improve accuracy.

tools.name: calkit
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible pipeline and version control tool for research
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to simplify version control, environment management, and reproducible pipelines specifically for research projects.

tools.name: EVA
tools.one_line_profile: Visual pivoting for unsupervised entity alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the EVA model for unsupervised entity alignment in knowledge graphs using visual pivoting.

tools.name: SapBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Self-alignment pretraining for biomedical entity linking
tools.detailed_description: A model and tool for cross-lingual biomedical entity linking, utilizing self-alignment pretraining for BERT.

tools.name: dbt-column-lineage-extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Column lineage extractor for dbt
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting and analyzing column-level data lineage from dbt projects, supporting data governance and provenance.

tools.name: ontology-matching-service
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based ontology matching service
tools.detailed_description: A service leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to facilitate ontology matching and metadata extraction for scientific data.

tools.name: neonstore
tools.one_line_profile: Local content-based storage system for NEON data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for managing and storing data from the National Ecological Observatory Network (NEON) locally, ensuring data persistence and provenance.

tools.name: MultiTensor
tools.one_line_profile: Multilayer network tensor factorization library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for multilayer network tensor factorization, supporting community detection and link prediction tasks.

tools.name: dblink
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed Bayesian Entity Resolution library for Apache Spark
tools.detailed_description: A Scala library for performing distributed Bayesian entity resolution (record linkage) on large datasets using Apache Spark, enabling probabilistic deduplication and linking.

tools.name: GetUrRecon
tools.one_line_profile: Data-centric entity matching and reconciliation toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for entity matching, resolution, normalization, and reconciliation, focusing on data processing workflows independent of specific platforms.

tools.name: PyTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Map-matching toolbox for vehicle trajectory reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for reconstructing vehicle trajectories using map-matching algorithms, facilitating the alignment of raw GPS data with road networks for transportation research.

tools.name: RecordLinkage
tools.one_line_profile: R package for record linkage and data deduplication
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R package providing functions for linking and deduplicating data sets, including methods for blocking, comparison, and classification.

tools.name: DataTracer
tools.one_line_profile: Library for tracing data lineage and provenance
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to trace the lineage of data, helping to identify the source and processing history of datasets, developed by the Data to AI Lab.

tools.name: Data Prep Kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for preparing unstructured data for Generative AI
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit for processing and preparing unstructured data (text, code, etc.) for Generative AI applications, including deduplication, filtering, and normalization modules.

tools.name: Anonlink Entity Service
tools.one_line_profile: Privacy-preserving record linkage (PPRL) service
tools.detailed_description: A service for privacy-preserving record linkage, allowing entities to be matched across datasets without revealing sensitive information, developed by CSIRO's Data61.

tools.name: blocklib
tools.one_line_profile: Library implementing blocking techniques for record linkage
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing implementations of various blocking techniques to reduce the search space for record linkage tasks, developed by CSIRO's Data61.

tools.name: Databricks ARC
tools.one_line_profile: Automated entity resolution and data linkage solution
tools.detailed_description: A solution accelerator and library for automated entity resolution and data linkage on the Databricks Lakehouse platform, facilitating intra and inter data linking.

tools.name: PPRL Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Privacy-preserving record linkage toolkit for official statistics
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for privacy-preserving record linkage developed by the ONS Data Science Campus, demonstrating next-generation data linkage techniques for official statistics.

tools.name: csvdedupe
tools.one_line_profile: Command line tool for deduplicating CSV files using the dedupe library
tools.detailed_description: A command line utility that uses the dedupe library to perform fuzzy matching and deduplication on CSV datasets. It allows users to train the deduplication model interactively and apply it to clean data.

tools.name: dedupe
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for accurate and scalable fuzzy matching and entity resolution
tools.detailed_description: A python library that uses machine learning (active learning) to perform fuzzy matching, record deduplication, and entity resolution on structured data. It learns from user labeling to improve matching accuracy.

tools.name: Valentine
tools.one_line_profile: Experiment suite and framework for schema matching and dataset discovery
tools.detailed_description: A tool facilitating matching for dataset discovery methods and an extensible experiment suite for evaluating state-of-the-art schema matching methods.

tools.name: RaceID3_StemID2_package
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm for inference of cell types and lineage trees from single-cell RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing the RaceID3 and StemID2 algorithms for the identification of cell types and the inference of lineage trees from single-cell RNA-seq data.

tools.name: LSHDB
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel and distributed data engine for record linkage and similarity search
tools.detailed_description: A parallel and distributed data engine relying on Locality-Sensitive Hashing (LSH) and NoSQL systems to perform record linkage and privacy-preserving record linkage tasks.

tools.name: reclin
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic Record Linkage in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for performing probabilistic record linkage, allowing users to link records from different datasets based on probabilistic matching.

tools.name: reclin2
tools.one_line_profile: Record Linkage Toolkit for R (Successor to reclin)
tools.detailed_description: An improved toolkit for record linkage in R, providing functions for comparing records, generating pairs, and scoring matches.

tools.name: kiez
tools.one_line_profile: Hubness reduced nearest neighbor search for entity alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing hubness-reduced nearest neighbor search, specifically designed for entity alignment tasks using knowledge graph embeddings.

tools.name: Dolt
tools.one_line_profile: SQL database with Git-like version control for data provenance
tools.detailed_description: Dolt is a SQL database that supports Git-like functionality (clone, fork, branch, merge) for data. It is a critical tool for data provenance, versioning, and collaboration in scientific data management.

tools.name: DoltgreSQL
tools.one_line_profile: Version controlled PostgreSQL compatible database
tools.detailed_description: DoltgreSQL brings Dolt's version control capabilities (branching, merging, diffing) to the PostgreSQL ecosystem, enabling data provenance and versioning for Postgres users.

tools.name: doltpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python API for Dolt database
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interface to interact with Dolt databases, facilitating the integration of data versioning and provenance features into Python-based scientific workflows.

tools.name: pgdedupe
tools.one_line_profile: CLI for deduplicating PostgreSQL records using dedupe library
tools.detailed_description: A command line interface that applies the datamade/dedupe library to deduplicate records directly within a PostgreSQL database.

tools.name: paleotree
tools.one_line_profile: R library for analyzing and simulating phylogenies of extinct lineages
tools.detailed_description: An R package for analyzing, time-scaling, and simulating phylogenies of extinct/fossil lineages, including plotting diversity curves for stratigraphic range data.

tools.name: GraMi
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for frequent subgraph mining in large graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for frequent subgraph mining in a single large graph, supporting the discovery of frequent patterns and subgraphs with user-defined constraints.

tools.name: LogMap
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable ontology alignment and repair system with logic-based reasoning
tools.detailed_description: LogMap is a highly scalable ontology matching system that implements logic-based reasoning to ensure the logical consistency of the generated mappings. It is designed to handle large-scale biomedical ontologies.

tools.name: Python-Schema-Matching
tools.one_line_profile: Schema matching tool using XGBoost and Sentence Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to perform schema matching tasks on tables by leveraging XGBoost for classification and sentence-transformers for semantic feature extraction.

tools.name: Flyte DataCatalog
tools.one_line_profile: Service for indexing and versioning parameterized data artifacts
tools.detailed_description: Data Catalog is a core service within the Flyte ecosystem for indexing parameterized, strongly-typed data artifacts across revisions. It enables data provenance, memoization, and artifact discovery in ML/data workflows.

tools.name: Deduplipy
tools.one_line_profile: Entity resolution library using active learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for deduplication and entity resolution that uses active learning to train a logistic regression model on pairs of records, minimizing the need for manual labeling.

tools.name: Graphiti
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building dynamic knowledge graphs from unstructured data
tools.detailed_description: Graphiti is a Python library designed to build and manage dynamic, temporally-aware knowledge graphs from unstructured text, enabling AI agents to maintain long-term memory and context.

tools.name: Berkeley Entity Resolution System
tools.one_line_profile: Joint entity resolution, coreference, and linking system
tools.detailed_description: The Berkeley Entity Resolution System is a Scala-based tool that jointly solves named entity recognition, coreference resolution, and entity linking problems using a feature-rich discriminative model.

tools.name: Ground
tools.one_line_profile: Data context service for managing data lineage and versioning
tools.detailed_description: Ground is an open-source data context service that manages the lineage, versioning, and metadata of data artifacts, providing a vendor-neutral platform for data provenance.

tools.name: Magellan
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial data analytics and optimization engine for Spark
tools.detailed_description: Magellan is a distributed execution engine for geospatial analytics on Apache Spark, providing efficient spatial joins, intersections, and geometric operations for large-scale spatial data.

tools.name: prov-io
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance management framework for scientific data I/O libraries
tools.detailed_description: A C library designed to capture and manage provenance information specifically for high-performance computing (HPC) scientific data I/O, enabling traceability of data generation processes.

tools.name: raccoon
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel FEM code for phase-field fracture modeling
tools.detailed_description: A C++ finite element method (FEM) code developed by Dolbow Lab for simulating phase-field fracture mechanics on massively parallel architectures.

tools.name: dataset-dedupe-estimator
tools.one_line_profile: Estimator for deduplication in large parquet datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool to estimate the amount of duplication in large datasets (parquet format), essential for data cleaning and preparation in scientific machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: dedupe_estimator
tools.one_line_profile: Chunk-based deduplication estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for estimating duplication rates in data chunks, serving as a high-performance component for dataset curation and quality control.

tools.name: learned-string-alignments
tools.one_line_profile: Learning string alignments for entity alias resolution
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for learning string alignment models to identify entity aliases, supporting entity resolution and normalization tasks in knowledge graphs.

tools.name: easylink
tools.one_line_profile: Configurable record linkage and entity resolution pipeline tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool from IHME for building and running highly configurable record linkage (entity resolution) pipelines, designed for processing public health and demographic data.

tools.name: pseudopeople
tools.one_line_profile: Generator of realistic simulated population data for entity resolution testing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that generates realistic simulated data about a fictional US population, specifically designed to test and benchmark entity resolution and record linkage algorithms.

tools.name: spark-matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable record matching and entity resolution on Spark
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing record matching and entity resolution at scale using Apache Spark, suitable for processing large scientific or administrative datasets.

tools.name: hlink
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical record linkage tool at scale
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool developed by IPUMS for performing hierarchical record linkage on large-scale census and demographic datasets.

tools.name: GMatch4py
tools.one_line_profile: Graph matching library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing various graph matching algorithms (GED, etc.) in Python/Cython, useful for structural analysis and alignment in scientific graph data.

tools.name: graph_matching
tools.one_line_profile: Maximum matchings finder for undirected graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby library for finding maximum matchings in undirected graphs, applicable in combinatorial optimization and network analysis tasks.

tools.name: MAGELLAN
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of interpretable computational models for biological reasoning
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for generating interpretable models for biological reasoning, supporting hypothesis generation and systems biology analysis.

tools.name: gnn4lp
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Networks for Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing Graph Neural Networks (GNN) specifically for link prediction tasks in graphs, applicable to knowledge graph completion.

tools.name: GCN-GAN-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: GCN-GAN implementation for temporal link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GCN-GAN (Graph Convolutional Network - Generative Adversarial Network) for predicting links in temporal graphs.

tools.name: GMTracker
tools.one_line_profile: Learnable Graph Matching for Multiple Object Tracking
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a learnable graph matching approach for multiple object tracking, incorporating graph partitioning with deep feature learning.

tools.name: deep_learn_entity_level_distributed_representation_coreference_chinese
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese coreference resolution implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of entity-level distributed representation for coreference resolution in Chinese text, based on Stanford's research.

tools.name: loops
tools.one_line_profile: JupyterLab extension for iterative and exploratory data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that supports provenance tracking and iterative workflows for exploratory data analysis in computational notebooks.

tools.name: fuzzylink
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic record linkage using pretrained text embeddings
tools.detailed_description: An R package for probabilistic record linkage that leverages pretrained text embeddings to improve matching accuracy, developed for social science research.

tools.name: Meta-Graph
tools.one_line_profile: Meta-learning framework for few-shot link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of meta-learning algorithms designed for few-shot link prediction tasks in graphs, enabling inference on sparse networks.

tools.name: OpenHHEA
tools.one_line_profile: Highly heterogeneous entity alignment toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit for highly heterogeneous entity alignment (HHEA) in knowledge graphs, providing methods to align entities across diverse data sources.

tools.name: fastLink
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Probabilistic Record Linkage R package
tools.detailed_description: An R package implementing fast probabilistic record linkage methods for large datasets, capable of handling missing data and providing uncertainty estimates for merged data.

tools.name: Kurator-Akka
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance-enabled workflow platform for biodiversity data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow platform and toolkit based on Akka actors, specifically designed to curate biodiversity data while automatically tracking and managing data provenance.

tools.name: Lamindb
tools.one_line_profile: Data framework for biology with lineage and FAIR principles
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive data framework for biology that manages data lineage, ontologies, and reproducibility, integrating with lakehouses, ELNs, and LIMS systems.

tools.name: Duke
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and flexible deduplication engine
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance deduplication and record linkage engine written in Java, supporting various comparators (Levenshtein, Jaro-Winkler, etc.) and database backends for entity resolution.

tools.name: ProvToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for W3C PROV data model
tools.detailed_description: A Java toolkit for creating, manipulating, and converting provenance data compliant with the W3C PROV standard, supporting multiple serializations and bindings.

tools.name: DataTracker
tools.one_line_profile: Pin tool for high-fidelity data provenance
tools.detailed_description: A binary instrumentation tool using Intel Pin to collect fine-grained data provenance from unmodified executables, enabling detailed lineage tracking of data processing.

tools.name: SuperGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for feature matching
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained graph neural network model and solver for feature matching and correspondence problems in computer vision, widely used for geometric alignment and registration.

tools.name: SingleCellLineage
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing GESTALT single-cell lineage tracing data
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and pipelines designed for processing GESTALT (Genome Editing of Synthetic Target Arrays for Lineage Tracing) data at single-cell resolution, enabling lineage reconstruction in developmental biology.

tools.name: GraphRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Modular graph-based Retrieval-Augmented Generation system
tools.detailed_description: A system that uses LLMs to build knowledge graphs from unstructured text and perform retrieval-augmented generation. In scientific contexts, it is used for literature review, evidence extraction, and synthesizing knowledge from scientific corpora.

tools.name: Decagon
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Neural Network for polypharmacy side effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: A model implementation for modeling polypharmacy side effects using graph convolutional neural networks on multimodal graphs. It predicts links (side effects) between drug pairs.

tools.name: LLAMAS Pyjamas
tools.one_line_profile: Data reduction pipeline for the Magellan LLAMAS spectrograph
tools.detailed_description: A data reduction pipeline designed for the LLAMAS (Large Lenslet Array Magellan Spectrograph) instrument, handling the processing of integral field spectrograph data.

tools.name: RSoptSC
tools.one_line_profile: Cell-cell communication and lineage inference from scRNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for inferring cell-cell communication networks and reconstructing lineage trajectories from single-cell RNA sequencing data using optimization-based approaches.

tools.name: Splink
tools.one_line_profile: Probabilistic record linkage and entity resolution library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for probabilistic record linkage (entity resolution) that allows deduplication and linking of large datasets. It supports multiple SQL backends (DuckDB, Spark, Athena) and is widely used in social science, demography, and epidemiology.

tools.name: CellTagR
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for CellTagging lineage reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to analyze data from CellTagging experiments, facilitating clone calling and lineage reconstruction to track cell fate in biological systems.

tools.name: LinkPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine for graph link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB/C implementation of the Weisfeiler-Lehman Neural Machine (WLNM) algorithm for link prediction in knowledge graphs and social networks, as presented in KDD 2017.

tools.name: SEAL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network framework for link prediction using subgraph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: SEAL (Subgraphs, Embeddings, and Attributes for Link prediction) is a framework that extracts enclosing subgraphs around target links to learn heuristics for link prediction in knowledge graphs, as presented in NeurIPS 2018.

tools.name: Giovanni
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based environment for analysis and visualization of NASA geophysical data
tools.detailed_description: An online platform developed by NASA for the display, analysis, and provenance tracking of geophysical parameters from Earth science remote sensing data.

tools.name: ncats-adme
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction models for ADME properties in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Source code for the ADME@NCATS application, hosting QSAR prediction models for Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, and Excretion (ADME) properties of chemical compounds.

tools.name: BlockingPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for blocking records in entity resolution using ANN
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that implements blocking techniques for record linkage and data deduplication, utilizing Approximate Nearest Neighbors (ANN) algorithms to scale entity resolution tasks.

tools.name: blocking
tools.one_line_profile: R package for blocking records in record linkage
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for blocking records in record linkage and data deduplication workflows, leveraging approximate nearest neighbours algorithms.

tools.name: git-mind
tools.one_line_profile: Protocol for version-controlled semantic knowledge graphs using Git
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that leverages Git to create database-less, version-controlled semantic knowledge graphs, enabling distributed cognition and provenance tracking for evolving interpretations.

tools.name: comparator
tools.one_line_profile: R library for similarity measures in record linkage
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing various similarity and distance measures specifically designed for clustering and record linkage applications.

tools.name: NHSE_probabilistic_linkage
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for probabilistic record linkage of healthcare data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline used at NHS England to create and evaluate probabilistic linkage models using the Splink package for deduplicating and linking record-level healthcare data.

tools.name: PMF-MMEA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal entity alignment with progressive modality freezing
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Progressively Modality Freezing method for Multi-Modal Entity Alignment (MMEA), as presented at ACL 2024.

tools.name: AliNet
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Graph Alignment Network with Gated Multi-hop Neighborhood Aggregation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of AliNet, a neural network model for entity alignment in knowledge graphs that aggregates multi-hop neighborhood information, presented at AAAI 2020.

tools.name: BootEA
tools.one_line_profile: Bootstrapping Entity Alignment with Knowledge Graph Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A bootstrapping approach for entity alignment that iteratively labels likely alignment pairs to improve knowledge graph embedding and alignment performance (IJCAI 2018).

tools.name: ContEA
tools.one_line_profile: Continual Entity Alignment for Growing Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for continual entity alignment designed to handle growing knowledge graphs and evolving data, presented at ISWC 2022.

tools.name: EventEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Entity Alignment for Event-centric Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool and dataset collection for evaluating entity alignment methods specifically on event-centric knowledge graphs.

tools.name: JAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-Lingual Entity Alignment via Joint Attribute-Preserving Embedding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of JAPE, a model for cross-lingual entity alignment that jointly embeds structures and attributes of knowledge graphs (ISWC 2017).

tools.name: MultiKE
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view Knowledge Graph Embedding for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-view embedding framework for entity alignment that combines multiple views of knowledge graphs (name, relation, attribute) to improve alignment accuracy (IJCAI 2019).

tools.name: OpenEA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking library for embedding-based entity alignment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking library and framework for evaluating embedding-based entity alignment approaches for knowledge graphs, as published in VLDB 2020.

tools.name: MDGAT-matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Keypoint matching for point cloud registration using Graph Attention Networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning based solver for point cloud registration (alignment) using Multiplex Dynamic Graph Attention Networks, published in RAL.

tools.name: Alignment
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative platform for ontology and vocabulary matching
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed to support collaborative, system-aided, and user-driven matching and validation of ontologies and vocabularies.

tools.name: winter
tools.one_line_profile: Java framework for data integration and identity resolution
tools.detailed_description: WInte.r (Web Data Integration Framework) is a Java framework that implements methods for data pre-processing, schema matching, identity resolution, and data fusion.

tools.name: elasticsearch-record-linkage
tools.one_line_profile: ElasticSearch plugin for record linkage scoring metrics
tools.detailed_description: An ElasticSearch plugin that exposes advanced scoring metrics specifically useful for performing record linkage and deduplication tasks within the search engine.

tools.name: heritrace
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic editor for GLAM data with provenance tracking
tools.detailed_description: A semantic editor designed for GLAM (Galleries, Libraries, Archives, Museums) professionals to enrich data while automatically tracking provenance and changes.

tools.name: nomenklatura
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for entity resolution and data integration in investigative graphs
tools.detailed_description: Nomenklatura is a Python library and command-line tool for performing entity resolution, record linkage, and data integration. It is designed to merge entities from disparate sources (like FollowTheMoney data streams), handling deduplication, canonicalization, and ID mapping, which is essential for constructing high-quality knowledge graphs.

tools.name: libpostal
tools.one_line_profile: Fast statistical parser and normalizer for international street addresses
tools.detailed_description: A C library for parsing and normalizing street addresses around the world using statistical NLP. It is a critical tool for entity normalization in geospatial data processing, enabling the alignment of location entities in scientific and demographic datasets.

tools.name: lieu
tools.one_line_profile: Deduplication and geocoding engine based on libpostal
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages libpostal to perform deduplication and batch geocoding of addresses and venues. It facilitates the resolution of location entities in large datasets, supporting the construction of geospatial knowledge bases.

tools.name: SparkDataLineageCapture
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to capture data lineage from Spark SQL logical plans
tools.detailed_description: A Scala library designed to intercept and capture the logical execution plans from Apache Spark jobs. It enables the tracking of data provenance and lineage in large-scale data processing pipelines, which is essential for reproducibility and auditing in scientific data workflows.

tools.name: Phovea CLUE
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance tracking and visualization library for visual exploration
tools.detailed_description: CLUE (Capture, Label, Understand, Explain) is a library within the Phovea ecosystem for tracking and visualizing the provenance of user interactions and data states in visual analysis tools. It supports reproducibility and storytelling in scientific data visualization.

tools.name: EPInformer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for gene expression and gene-enhancer link prediction
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for predicting gene expression and identifying gene-enhancer interactions (links) using genomic data. It utilizes deep learning or statistical methods to infer regulatory relationships, contributing to the construction of gene regulatory networks.

tools.name: STREAM
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell Trajectories Reconstruction, Exploration And Mapping
tools.detailed_description: An interactive pipeline for reconstructing complex cellular differentiation trajectories from single-cell RNA-sequencing data. It models the developmental paths (provenance/lineage of cells) and visualizes them as a graph structure.

tools.name: PROV-A
tools.one_line_profile: Web tool for creating and publishing provenance data as Linked Open Data
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application designed to facilitate the creation of provenance information conforming to the PROV standard. It allows users to generate and publish provenance graphs as Linked Open Data (LOD), supporting scientific reproducibility and data lineage tracking.

tools.name: jsonmapping
tools.one_line_profile: Library to transform flat data into nested JSON object graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library used to map flat data structures (like CSV rows) into nested JSON object graphs based on schema definitions. It is widely used in data integration pipelines (e.g., OpenSanctions) to normalize and structure raw data into entity-centric formats.

tools.name: DeepER
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-End Deep Learning framework for Entity Resolution
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based system for entity resolution (record linkage). It uses recurrent neural networks (RNNs) with attention mechanisms to learn vector representations of tuples and compute similarities, enabling accurate deduplication and alignment of entities in dirty datasets.

tools.name: deeper-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python version of the DeepER entity resolution tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the DeepER entity resolution framework. It provides a more accessible and lightweight approach to performing deep learning-based entity alignment and deduplication compared to the original Lua version.

tools.name: qKnow
tools.one_line_profile: Enterprise-grade Knowledge Graph platform for extraction, fusion, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An open-source knowledge graph platform that provides end-to-end capabilities for knowledge extraction, fusion (alignment), graph construction, and visualization. It is designed to help organizations build structured knowledge systems from unstructured data.

tools.name: linkpred
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for link prediction in graphs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing link prediction on graphs. It implements various topological predictors (e.g., Adamic-Adar, Jaccard) and provides a framework for evaluating their performance, useful for inferring missing relations in scientific networks.

tools.name: Compass
tools.one_line_profile: Data catalog and lineage platform for data discovery and governance
tools.detailed_description: An enterprise data catalog system that provides data discovery, metadata management, and lineage tracking. It helps users understand the provenance and relationships of data assets across an organization, supporting data governance and reproducibility.

tools.name: maximum-weighted-bipartite-matching
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for maximum weighted bipartite matching in graphs
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of an algorithm to compute the maximum weighted bipartite matching of a graph. This algorithmic primitive is frequently used in scientific tasks such as taxonomy alignment, entity resolution, and biological sequence matching.

tools.name: dupuis
tools.one_line_profile: UI tool for record deduplication and linkage
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based user interface tool designed to assist in the manual review and active learning phases of record deduplication and linkage. It helps users label potential duplicates to train or validate entity resolution models.

tools.name: EA_for_KG
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark library for Knowledge Graph Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library and benchmark suite for Knowledge Graph Entity Alignment (EA). It contains implementations of state-of-the-art representation learning-based algorithms for aligning entities across different knowledge graphs.

tools.name: deep-graph-matching-consensus
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Deep Graph Matching Consensus
tools.detailed_description: A robust PyTorch implementation of the Deep Graph Matching Consensus algorithm. It provides a solver for graph matching problems, which involves finding correspondences between nodes in two graphs, a fundamental task in structural analysis and entity alignment.

tools.name: s3git
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed version control tool for large datasets on cloud storage
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool that brings git-like versioning to large datasets stored in cloud object storage (S3). It supports deduplication and versioning of massive data repositories, enabling data lineage and management for scientific datasets that exceed typical git limits.

tools.name: KnowledgeGraphQA-Langgraph
tools.one_line_profile: System for generating knowledge graphs from text and performing Q&A
tools.detailed_description: An AI-powered tool that converts unstructured text into knowledge graphs and enables graph-based question answering. It integrates LLMs with Neo4j to automate the extraction of entities and relations, facilitating the construction of queryable knowledge bases.

tools.name: MagellanMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for 3D bioimage annotation and atlas registration
tools.detailed_description: A graphical interface and software suite for annotating 3D biological images, performing atlas registration (alignment), and quantifying regional data. It is used in neuroscience and microscopy to map experimental data to reference atlases.

tools.name: llm-data-annotation
tools.one_line_profile: Framework using LLMs and Active Learning for data annotation
tools.detailed_description: A framework that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) and Iterative Active Learning to automate and enhance data annotation. It integrates CleanLab for confident learning to ensure high-quality datasets, supporting the creation of training data for scientific models.

tools.name: Event Provenance Registry
tools.one_line_profile: Service for managing and tracking event provenance
tools.detailed_description: A service designed to manage, store, and track the provenance of events and their receivers. It provides a registry for auditing data flows and event chains, which is critical for establishing trust and lineage in distributed data processing systems.

tools.name: DVCP-TE
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation model of the Tennessee Eastman chemical process for security research
tools.detailed_description: A simulation implementation of the Tennessee Eastman chemical process, designed as a testbed for research in industrial control systems (ICS) security and process control. It generates data for analyzing cyber-physical attacks and defense mechanisms.

tools.name: JedAIToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: High scalability toolkit for Entity Resolution and Record Linkage
tools.detailed_description: An open source, high scalability toolkit in Java for Entity Resolution, offering state-of-the-art methods for data cleaning and integration tasks.

tools.name: OntoAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Ontology Alignment and matching
tools.detailed_description: A Python Toolkit for Ontology Alignment, facilitating the matching and integration of different ontological structures.

tools.name: event_entity_coref_ecb_plus
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-document event and entity coreference resolution system
tools.detailed_description: A system for resolving coreferences of events and entities across multiple documents, trained on the ECB+ corpus.

tools.name: SpEL
tools.one_line_profile: Structured Prediction for Entity Linking
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Entity Linking using structured prediction methods to disambiguate and link entities to a knowledge base.

tools.name: NeuralCoMapping
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Robot Active Mapping via Neural Bipartite Graph Matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a neural bipartite graph matching approach for multi-robot active mapping and spatial alignment.

tools.name: GIMS
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-Based Image Matching System
tools.detailed_description: A system for matching images using graph-based structures, useful for computer vision and structural alignment tasks.

tools.name: spindle-token
tools.one_line_profile: Privacy Preserving Record Linkage (OPPRL) implementation
tools.detailed_description: PySpark implementation of the Open Privacy Preserving Record Linkage (OPPRL) specification for secure entity resolution.

tools.name: java_data_lineage
tools.one_line_profile: SQL and stored procedure data lineage analyzer in Java
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze and extract data lineage from SQL scripts and stored procedures, aiding in data provenance tracking.

tools.name: python_data_lineage
tools.one_line_profile: Data lineage analysis tools in Python
tools.detailed_description: Python-based tools for extracting and visualizing data lineage from SQL and other data processing scripts.

tools.name: MedType
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Entity Linking with Semantic Type Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving medical entity linking by incorporating semantic type prediction, specifically designed for biomedical text.

tools.name: LinChemIn
tools.one_line_profile: Linked Chemical Information toolkit for reaction data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit that leverages the connectivity of Chemical Reaction Data to provide insights and metrics on predicted synthetic routes.

tools.name: Crosslingula-KG-Matching
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-lingual Knowledge Graph Alignment via Graph Matching Neural Network
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Matching Neural Networks for aligning entities across cross-lingual knowledge graphs.

tools.name: data-lineage-parent
tools.one_line_profile: Big data lineage analysis platform using Neo4j
tools.detailed_description: A system to parse and generate data lineage from Hive, Sqoop, HBase, and Spark jobs, visualizing dependencies in Neo4j.

tools.name: IEAJKE
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative Entity Alignment via Joint Knowledge Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A solver for entity alignment in knowledge graphs using joint knowledge embeddings and iterative training.

tools.name: MuGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Channel Graph Neural Network for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: A multi-channel graph neural network approach for aligning entities between different knowledge graphs.

tools.name: explore-and-evaluate
tools.one_line_profile: Entity Alignment using Attributes, Values, and Structures
tools.detailed_description: A framework for exploring and evaluating the role of attributes, values, and structures in knowledge graph entity alignment.

tools.name: tokern-data-lineage
tools.one_line_profile: Data Lineage generation and visualization from query history
tools.detailed_description: A tool to parse SQL query history and generate column-level data lineage graphs for data governance and debugging.

tools.name: trinity-ie
tools.one_line_profile: Information extraction pipeline for coreference and linking
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive information extraction pipeline that includes modules for coreference resolution, named entity linking, and relationship extraction.

tools.name: SQLServer-Data-Lineage
tools.one_line_profile: Data Lineage for Microsoft SQL Server and Azure Synapse
tools.detailed_description: A utility to extract and visualize data lineage specifically for SQL Server and Azure Synapse environments.

tools.name: LineageExplorer
tools.one_line_profile: SARS-CoV2 variant growth rate estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to estimate the growth rate advantage of SARS-CoV2 variants of concern using genomic surveillance data.

tools.name: stairlight
tools.one_line_profile: Data lineage tool for SQL table dependencies
tools.detailed_description: A data lineage tool that detects table dependencies from rendered SQL statements, supporting file-based configuration.

tools.name: DVC
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source version control system for machine learning projects and data
tools.detailed_description: Data Version Control (DVC) is a tool for data science and machine learning projects that replaces spreadsheets and ad-hoc scripts with a Git-like workflow. It handles data versioning, experiment tracking, and pipeline management.

tools.name: DVCLive
tools.one_line_profile: Library for logging machine learning metrics and tracking experiments
tools.detailed_description: DVCLive is a Python library for logging machine learning metrics, parameters, and model artifacts. It integrates with DVC to provide experiment tracking and visualization capabilities.

tools.name: SERF
tools.one_line_profile: Stanford Entity-Resolution Framework
tools.detailed_description: A generic infrastructure for Entity Resolution (ER) that provides a framework for resolving entities in data sets. It supports various ER algorithms and configurations.

tools.name: Spectral-Gromov-Wasserstein
tools.one_line_profile: Graph matching and clustering via optimal transport
tools.detailed_description: Implements a method for graph matching and clustering by comparing heat kernels via optimal transport, specifically using the Spectral Gromov-Wasserstein distance.

tools.name: prov
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV)
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides an implementation of the W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV) in Python, allowing for the creation, manipulation, and serialization of provenance information.

tools.name: ComplEx
tools.one_line_profile: Complex Embeddings for Link Prediction in Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: Source code for experiments involving Complex Embeddings for Simple Link Prediction and Knowledge Graph Completion via Complex Tensor Factorization.

tools.name: DyGLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Graph Model with Link Prediction for Object Tracking
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of DyGLIP, a dynamic graph model that utilizes link prediction for accurate multi-camera multiple object tracking.

tools.name: OpenGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Net Based Pipeline for Image Matching
tools.detailed_description: An open-source pipeline based on Graph Neural Networks for image matching, serving as a free alternative to SuperGlue for feature matching tasks.

tools.name: onefl-deduper
tools.one_line_profile: Patient de-duplication tool for Electronic Health Records
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for probabilistic record linkage and de-duplication of patient entities in Electronic Health Record (EHR) datasets.

tools.name: Magellan (Ultralytics)
tools.one_line_profile: Earth observation software powered by Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: Software for Earth observation that utilizes Machine Learning, capable of visualization in Google Maps and WebGL Earth.

tools.name: RLTK
tools.one_line_profile: Record Linkage ToolKit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source toolkit for Record Linkage (Entity Resolution) that provides components for blocking, matching, and clustering entities.

tools.name: nominally
tools.one_line_profile: Name parser for record linkage
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to parse human names into structured components to support record linkage and entity resolution tasks.

tools.name: SGMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Seeded Graph Matching Network for feature matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Seeded Graph Matching Network (SGMNet) for learning to match features, as presented in ICCV 2021.

tools.name: MinoanER
tools.one_line_profile: Entity Resolution framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Entity Resolution (ER) designed to identify descriptions referring to the same entity within or across knowledge bases.

tools.name: OpenCorr
tools.one_line_profile: Digital Image and Volume Correlation Library
tools.detailed_description: An open-source C++ library for Digital Image Correlation (2D-DIC) and Digital Volume Correlation (3D-DVC) analysis.

tools.name: EMGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Entity Alignment with Multi-order Convolutional Networks
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the paper 'Entity Alignment for Knowledge Graphs with Multi-order Convolutional Networks'.

tools.name: entity-embed
tools.one_line_profile: Vector-based Entity Resolution library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for transforming entities into vectors to support scalable Record Linkage and Entity Resolution using Approximate Nearest Neighbors.

tools.name: trrack
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance tracking library for visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A library for tracking history and provenance in web-based visualizations, enabling undo/redo and state management.

tools.name: SphereGlue
tools.one_line_profile: Feature matching for spherical images
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network based feature matching tool specifically designed for high-resolution spherical images.

tools.name: PipelineIE
tools.one_line_profile: Information Extraction pipeline with Entity Resolution
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for information extraction from text that includes modules for coreference resolution and entity resolution, supporting custom models.

tools.name: graph-representation-learning
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoders for Link Prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of autoencoders for link prediction and semi-supervised node classification in graphs.

tools.name: bayesian-record-linkage
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian models for record linkage
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Bayesian approaches to graphical record linkage and de-duplication, based on the SMERED model.

tools.name: lgl-feature-matching
tools.one_line_profile: Lifelong Graph Learning for Feature Matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Lifelong Graph Learning methods applied to the task of feature matching.

tools.name: MMGraphRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal knowledge graph framework
tools.detailed_description: A multi-modal knowledge graph-based framework designed to enhance complex reasoning tasks like document question-answering by integrating text and image data.

tools.name: TraceFL
tools.one_line_profile: Provenance tracking for Federated Learning
tools.detailed_description: A mechanism for Federated Learning that achieves interpretability by tracking neuron provenance to identify clients responsible for global model predictions.

tools.name: PyDI
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end data integration framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework providing methods for end-to-end data integration, covering schema matching, data translation, entity matching, and data fusion.

tools.name: DESAlign
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Modal Entity Alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Dirichlet Energy Driven Robust Multi-Modal Entity Alignment for semantic consistency.

tools.name: ClusterEA
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Entity Alignment tool
tools.detailed_description: Source code for ClusterEA, a method for scalable entity alignment using stochastic training and normalized mini-batch similarities.

tools.name: BioGraphFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Knowledge Embedding for Biological Reasoning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of BioGraphFusion, a graph knowledge embedding method for biological completion and reasoning.

tools.name: DLGM
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning of Graph Matching
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of deep learning models for graph matching tasks.

tools.name: VF2
tools.one_line_profile: VF2 Graph Isomorphism Algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the VF2 algorithm for subgraph isomorphism and matching large graphs.

tools.name: Link-Prediction-on-Social-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Link prediction algorithms for social networks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of algorithms for link prediction in social networks.

tools.name: SuperGlue-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: SuperGlue Feature Matching Network
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the SuperGlue network for learning feature matching with graph neural networks.

tools.name: COTSA
tools.one_line_profile: Co-Training for Entity Alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of COTSAE, a method for co-training structure and attribute embeddings for entity alignment.

tools.name: zentity
tools.one_line_profile: Entity resolution plugin for Elasticsearch to handle duplicate detection
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for Elasticsearch that enables real-time entity resolution. It allows users to define resolution models in JSON to find and link duplicate entities across indices, supporting the alignment and fusion of knowledge graph data.

tools.name: ZnTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter tracking and provenance tool for DVC pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for DVC (Data Version Control) that simplifies the creation, execution, and benchmarking of scientific workflows. It focuses on tracking parameters, metrics, and provenance of data, facilitating reproducible research and experiment management.

tools.name: Zingg
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable machine learning platform for entity resolution and data mastering
tools.detailed_description: An enterprise-grade tool for identity resolution and entity linking. It uses machine learning to deduplicate and link records across large datasets, supporting the construction of unified views for knowledge graphs and master data management.
